item.description: Come share your music and listen to the music of other singer-songwriters. The cost of admission is $5. Club Passim is a wonderful venue that I have been to many times. Come at 6 pm and we can chat about songwriting, the show starts at 7 pm. The food is also excellent, as Veggie Planet is attached to the club. I hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be sitting in the back of the room on the side with the windows.

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Club Passim Open Mic
